segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the concentration on his face as he stretches toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, but he doesn’t seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s cute how they’re working together to get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely clueless, which makes it even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is balancing so carefully, like a little tightrope walker.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, but it’s not as exciting as the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a fun little moment to watch unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR
